repos.description: Open source headless commerce that’s fast, flexible, and built to scale,launch stunning storefronts that convert and grow your business without limits.
A frontend library for React and Vue that helps developers quickly build fast, accessible, and beautiful storefronts. Made with 💚 by Vue Storefront team and contributors.

Example Storefront is Reaction Commerce’s headless ecommerce storefront - Next.js, GraphQL, React. Built using Apollo Client and the commerce-focused React UI components provided in the Storefront Component Library (reactioncommerce/reaction-component-library). It connects with Reaction backend with the GraphQL API.
React Storefront - PWA for eCommerce. 100% offline, platform agnostic, headless, Magento 2 supported. Always Open Source, Apache-2.0 license. Join us as contributor (contributors@reactstorefront.io).
React-based JavaScript frontend framework to create a progressive web app (PWA) storefront for Salesforce B2C Commerce.
Headless, composable ecommerce storefront built with Next.js, Typescript, and shadcn/ui.
A fully-featured Shopify Hydrogen starter theme packed with versatile components designed to seamlessly integrate with Pack and Shopify Hydrogen
GraphCommerce® is a headless storefront replacement for Magento 2 (PWA), that delivers a faster, better user experience. Fully customizable (React, Next.js) and open-source.
Open source MMP for ownership of your mobile ad data

Open Movement devices are miniature, open source sensors originally developed at Newcastle University, UK. The source code for the firmware and software is under a BSD 2-clause license, and the hardware (PCB designs, layouts and schematics), enclosure designs and documentation are available under a Creative Commons 3.0 BY Attribution License.
Starter template for a Shopify Headless React Storefront using TailwindCSS
An Android library to easily display attribution information of open source libraries.
Reference Storefront Progressive Web Application in React
Processes bitcoin binary data to flat file formats suitable for import to other development/analysis tools. Licensed under standard apache open source license. Attribution is appreciated.
